body_html: @alextp I was able to implement support for stacks and other things used in the Python code, but I'm not sure what to do about the "op._update_input" method that's used quite a lot apparently for control flow ops. I wonder how difficult it would be to support that method in the C API given that constructed ops are supposed to be immutable. I imagine it shouldn't be too hard, but I don't know if you're willing to expose such functionality. If not, is there another way I could replicate it without constructing the proto defs in the Scala side, like the Python API does?
